column1: This is what happens when we have #BorisJohnson as PM. We need a leader and Boris is not that person. This is #HerdImmunity playing out in real-time. #BorisIsWeak #BorisJohnsonMustGo #DominicCummngsMustGo #coronavirus #coronavirusuk #UKLockdown
